thumb.title: The First 15 Minutes of Final Fantasy IX (PlayStation)
thumb.description: Copied from Infogalactic:Final Fantasy IX is a role-playing video game developed and published by Square for the Sony PlayStation video game console. Originally released in 2000, it is the ninth title in the Final Fantasy series and last to debut on the original PlayStation console. The game introduced new features to the series like the "Active Time Event", "Mognet", and a unique equipment and skill system.Final Fantasy IX's plot centers on a war between nations. Players follow a young thief named Zidane Tribal, who joins with others to defeat Queen Brahne of Alexandria, the one responsible for starting the war. The plot shifts, however, when the characters realise that Brahne is working with an even more threatening person called Kuja.Final Fantasy IX was developed alongside Final Fantasy VIII, but took a different approach by returning to the more traditional style of the early Final Fantasy games, and features allusions to other titles in the series.

tags.tag: ファイナルファンタジー9
